node.title: Zero TV
node.content:
I have been working on my Kodi addons for a number of years now.

My Free Live TV addon has been one of my favorites to work on. I have been thinking about creating a web based version for quite some time. I have decided it would make a great addition to Pi Lab.

Zero TV is running on a Raspberry Pi Zero! See full specs here.

The site uses Bludit and a customized version of the Highway theme from Jellyio. All content is pulled from freely available legal sources online.

Check it out at zerotv.pilab.dev!
